Adana is famous for its kebabs and the most difficult part is choosing the right restaurant. Birbicer was on many Top 10 lists so we chose to go there. 
 But beware! There are 2 Birbicer restaurants, this one is the original and the other one ( which may also be good) is the branch. This original Birbicer is in the Kurukopru region and is very popular among locals. 

The atmosphere is simple and unpretentious but the food and the service is excellent. They bring lots of salads as starters ( on the house) and then you choose your kebab. Their lahmacun and Adana kebab are delicious. The liver was also nice and soft but the Adana kebab was our favorite. The pistachio dessert was out of this world. They keep bringing glasses of tea on the house at the end. Prices are more reasonable than in Istanbul.

reviews.title: Cheap eats!
reviews.review_text: Situated on the taxi rank roundabout, this little place serves authentic & freshly cooked Turkish food at a great price.

reviews.title: And they deliver to your villa
reviews.review_text: Good standard Turkish menu, well cooked and good value. We got a take away delivered on our first night and all family members very happy with the meal

reviews.title: Turkish fast food
reviews.review_text:
Cheap tasty Turkish food.
The venue feels a little bit like a fast food outlet, but the food quality is genuine, and for less than £15 (500 TL at the time of writing) for 2 people, very cheap. 
I wouldn’t stop here for a long family dinner, but it’s a good choice for a no frills pit stop after a day at a beach club or a few beers.

reviews.title: Amazing authentic Turkish restaurant
reviews.review_text: This is an amazing little restaurant, visited by locals too. Food is great and very reasonable. They don't serve alcohol but we go there after visiting a few bars, but honestly, you cannot fault the food here. Very friendly service too. Would highly recommend.

reviews.title: Excellent Turkish restaurant
reviews.review_text: Excellent Turkish food and really reasonably priced. Well located in the centre of town with a nice view over the town and sea. Friendly service, great for eat in or deliveries.

reviews.title: Very nice Adana kebap around the giant grill
reviews.review_text:
Huge restaurant.
I chose and i  recommend siting around the grill.
Adana kebap is their specialty. 
I tried it and i highly recommend it.
Friendly and kind staff.

reviews.title: Amazing food
reviews.review_text: We love Turkish food. Adana Sofrasi is a great example of how to do it right. Reasonable in price and amazing food. Cold meze starter enormous. Pide and the liver main courses excellent. The only criticism was that the main course came a bit quicker than expected, not finished starter. So much food we asked for some to take away. Definitely worth a visit.

reviews.title: Dinner
reviews.review_text: Nice place for eat out instead of the normal hotel dinners or fast foods at the mall. Food is fresh and staff are good. The lamb & wings are awesome

reviews.title: The food was delicious.
reviews.review_text: The place was crowded. We had to eat outside, even though the night was chilly. The porch area was heated, so it was all good. There were four of us, so we choose four kebabs. We wanted to start with a salad. We were unsure what to select, so the waiter suggested the Adana salad. It was delicious! We had the four kebabs come out family style. We chose the Adana (a sausage), chicken, lamb, and beef. They were all quite tasty. We finished our meal with dessert and of course Turkish Tea. Our tour guide had also recommended this place and most in our group went. Everyone raved.

reviews.title: Great place for local food and especially kebab
reviews.review_text: We went there with colleagues for a dinner. Made a booking as place is crowded in the evening time. We ordered number of starters and different types of kebabs. Food is delicious and huge grill in the center of the hall is rather impressive. I guess some people try to get a place with a grill view to observe the process. We enjoyed the starters, cheese plate and then got our kebabs. I had Adana kebab which is a bit chilly but delicious. Colleagues also tried other kebabs. If you are looking for a good place with delicious Turkish food in Cankaya then this is the place to go !

Adana Hilton SA Restaurant.address: Sinanpasa Mah Haci Sabanci Bul. No1 Yuregir, Adana 01220 Turkiye

reviews.title: A Small Window Opening to the Adana Cuisine
reviews.review_text: It is a nice and clean restaurant offering many local dishes as well as some other international food. You can enjoy almost ever dishes that you will try there. The staff are very friendly and helpful. If the weather is nice, you can sit at the outdoor tables to be the beneficiary of a pleasant garden and the scenic river (Seyhan) view.

reviews.title: very goooood
reviews.review_text: very nice,goooooood foooood,elegant, and sooooo cheap. it is amazing really but the only bad thing is their language, they shssould learn at least english.

reviews.title: One of the Better Hotels in Adana
reviews.review_text: One of the nicer hotels in Adana. Have stayed here multiple times for work. Hotel is a bit dated, but fairly nice and is clean. Staff is great. Restaurant is excellent. Very nice breakfast and great Adana kababs. Wifi is not perfect. Shower in the room is extremely small and not very nice. Shower drain usually drains slowly. Additionally they do not give you a face cloth/wash cloth with the bath towels. You are expected to use only a bar of soap and your hand to clean your body. I asked the hotel for some wash cloths and they don't have any. Strange situation for me as I was staying for over a week. Felt a bit dirty after a few days.............

reviews.title: Nice menu!
reviews.review_text: You can try traditional Adana kebap and mantı (Turkish dumplings) for dinner. Delicious! The meze platter is also a yummy choice for not so hungy guests! :)

reviews.title: Decent place, price point goes with Hilton
reviews.review_text: Beautiful decor an ambiance with a great view of their fountains pouring into their water lagoon. Food was good, a bit pricey for the area but still relatively cheap. Service was excellent and professional as you would expect from a Hilton property. This is the Spice Market, and has a limited menu unfortunately. Chinese bistro next door was closed, was told it will reopen next week.

reviews.title: Great find!
reviews.review_text: Lovely family run restaurant. Great place to watch the world go by. The menu selection is varied and the food was really good and reasonably priced although what really made it, was the staff who were really friendly and helpful. I would definitely recommend a visit!

reviews.title: Fantastic restaurant
reviews.review_text: We have been going to this restaurant for the last few years. Fantastic selection of food cooked to your order (I don’t like too spicy food) and great service. The staff here are second to none cannot do enough for you. We will be going again in September and will definetly be eating here one again. Jenny and John (chef).

reviews.title: Excellent & tasty traditional turkish food
reviews.review_text:
Last October, we spent several lunches & dinners at this place. 
The team was very friendly, explained to us everything. 
We were impressed with the taste of food. Everything was so delicious!

reviews.title: Best food, best owners
reviews.review_text: Came highly recommend from a local. Amazing food and the most wonderful, kind staff. We came with our 1 year old and not only did we feel very welcome, the owners and their lovely daughter kept her so busy and happy. Cannot say enough good things about this fabulous restaurant.

reviews.title: Good food, genuine friendliness
reviews.review_text: Know this restaurant for several years - simple and delicious Turkish food home made - owner/cookRamazan and his friendly family / staff are a real treasure - their friendliness comes from their heart and is exceptional - can't wait to be in Kaş again and eat there

Adana Grillhaus - Restaurant.description: Wir als das Adana Grillhaus sind ein Türkisches Grill-Restaurant im Herzen von Berlin, Kreuzberg. Bei uns treffen sich Einheimische mit Freunden oder Familie, um Fleisch wie den bekannten Adana Kebab mit hausgemachten Vorspeisen zu genießen. Ebenfalls können sie den Abend bei uns auch mit Raki und traditionell türkischer Musik ausklingen lassen.

reviews.title: Fantastic grilled meat
reviews.review_text: The quality of the food and the service is outstanding.  It is not a fancy restaurant, but it is nice with a good menu of delicious Turkish foods - especially those cooked on the grill.

reviews.title: Fantastic Turkish food
reviews.review_text: First time eating Turkish cuisine and it was great. From the starter mezze to the main of Turkish meatballs it was superb. Finished off the meal with a small bottle of Raki - a great digestif. Staff are very friendly providing great service. Highly recommend.

reviews.title: Amazing Grillhaus
reviews.review_text:
Simple but delicious. I come here every 3 months while here for business trip.
One of the best grillhaus i’ve been too.
Meat is fresh and perfectly cooked. Sides are nicely served.
The kind of place i miss when i am in Paris.

reviews.title: Excellent food
reviews.review_text: We reserved a table for eleven people on saturday night. The place was full and they took our orders in ten minutes. We got our food in twenty minutes, so it was really quick. The complimentary salad was the best salad we have ever eaten. The food was one of the best grill foods I have eaten, I recommend the number 14.

Sheraton Grand Adana.address: Haci Sabanci Boulevard No 7, Adana 01220 Turkiye
Sheraton Grand Adana.description: The iconic S-shaped Sheraton Grand Adana proudly follows in the tradition of linking East and West by offering an exciting space for trendsetting locals and cosmopolitan visitors. Vibrant, colorful restaurants and bars of Sheraton Grand Adana Hotel serve an intriguing blend of international cuisine and classic Turkish favorites, including the Adana Kebab. The hotel is a leisurely walk from the splendid Adana City Center and only 4.5 Kilometers away from Adana Sakirpasa Airport. Enjoy excellent views of the broad Seyhan River, spanned by Taskopru bridge, the world's oldest bridge still in use, the remarkable Sabanci Central Mosque and spacious Central Park, all just minutes away. The charming beaches of Yumurtalik and Karatas, far less crowded than more popular nearby resorts, are a short drive away. Enjoy upscale comforts in any of our 240 guest rooms just looking into excellent views of the broad Seyhan River and the city. Stay connected with High Speed Internet Access, and get a good night's sleep with a Sheraton Signature Sleep Experience. Recharge at the Sheraton Fitness and also Fitness Club & SPA center, take a dip in our indoor or outdoor pool, or indulge yourself with a pampering spa.
Sheraton Grand Adana.address_string: Haci Sabanci Boulevard No 7, Adana 01220 Turkiye
amenities: Photo Copier / Fax In Business Center

reviews.title: Worst Service
reviews.review_text:
The hotel infrastructure is really nice. But the service staff except some are very poor.
Specially breakfast service is very poor.

I stayed at this hotel more than a year but breakfast manager never tried to fix the issues.

Hotel staff do not care about regular business guest.

Fitness center is nice and staff is always friendly.

reviews.title: Very bad experience
reviews.review_text:
I have a room today in Sheraton adana hotel on second floor and the AC not working at all , the weather very hot , i called guest services (1700) many times to send someone to fix the AC she not understanding English and eveytime she ask me to repeat what i need. ANd told me the technician coming now 1 hour without any response.
Really very very bad experience in this hotel.

reviews.title: A beautiful hotel
reviews.review_text: The hotel is very grand, per the name, and there are beautiful, comfortable rooms and a wonderful view. There are some.staff that are excellent at their job,  Neslihan, Aysa, and the lounge crew is excellent. Osman, Ahmad, and most of the breakfast crew are professional, efficient, and courteous. The tennis court is perfect in the winter. I would expect higher quality and more diverse food from a 5 star hotel, but I also ate there a lot.

reviews.title: Great Experience at the Sheraton Grand Adana
reviews.review_text:
I decided to book the Grand Sheraton Adana after spending a week at hotel 10 min down the road (I***)that was overall terrible.  
Upon entering the lobby of the Grand Sheraton, I was greeted with friendly faces.  I was fortunate to have Mr. Gani attend to me while checking in.  He was polite and very attentive to my needs. The check in process was very pick and easy.  After speaking with Mr. Gani, I immediately knew that I had  selected the right hotel.  I will definitely recommend those visiting Adana to stay at the Sheraton Grand and experience  the pleasant atmosphere of the staff and facilities.

reviews.title: Close to city center
reviews.review_text: We visited Adana for the film festival and Sheraton Grand's location was handy. We could reach the city either by taxi or on foot. Our room was spacious with  beautiful view. Open pool was like heaven in that Adana heat. Staff was helpfull and polite. We loved our stay.

Adana Hilton SA.address: Sinanpasa Mah Haci Sabanci Bul No:1, Adana 01220 Turkiye
Adana Hilton SA.description: From Adana Sakirpasa Airport, the airport exit road leads to the traffic lights at the crossroads on Mersin-Adana Street. Turn right and continue straight until the River Seyhan. You will see the Adana Hilton SA hotel on the opposite side of the river and the hotel entrance is on the right-hand side just after the bridge. The journey takes about 5 minutes.
Adana Hilton SA.address_string: Sinanpasa Mah Haci Sabanci Bul No:1, Adana 01220 Turkiye

reviews.title: Adana HiltonSA highly recommended !
reviews.review_text:
Fantastic hotel with the best staff and customer service in Adana ☺️
Damla and Acelya in the customer care team are exceptional and managed me and Koch team so professionally.
The front desk are always friendly and welcoming and the executive lounge is a complete pleasure managed by the super friendly Selcuk

reviews.title: Clean, quality and peaceful.
reviews.review_text: There was no salad in Lounge. The meat served was very delicious. Lounge employee Selçuk took great care of us. The pool was freezing. The Hotel staff is always polite, friendly and professional. The Hotel is very close to the City Center.....

reviews.title: Our home away from home
reviews.review_text: Our favorite hotel in Adana, we always choose to stay here when we are in the city. Location, staff and breakfast is perfect. Naz (from the breakfast staff) is such a kind and friendly person, it has been a pleasure to know her. Rooms are wide and comfortable. We have tried massage this time, that was also very relaxing. Great service, we’ll keep coming back.

reviews.title: Disappointing Stay with Poor Service and Inconveniences
reviews.review_text:
The problems began as soon as we arrived at the hotel and continued with issues in the elevator. The staff showed no concern for our complaints and merely pretended to be working. We arrived at the hotel at 5 PM, yet our room, which was supposed to be ready by 2 PM, was still not prepared. Accessing the elevators was another hassle since they operate with room cards, and somehow, the staff managed to lose ours.

For future visits, be aware that you’re likely to face issues during both check-in and check-out. The bathrooms have no locks, and even something as simple as a cup of coffee can take up to two hours to reach your table.

reviews.title: Amazing Service and Nice clean rooms
reviews.review_text: Praise to the breakfast staff. NAZ displayed a bright smile and pleasant personality. As a frequent guest at this hotel since 2021, I can attest to this consistent service. Therefore, when in Turkey, choose the Hilton. And it is exceedingly nice and clean.

Ibis Adana.address: Turhan Cemal Beriker Bulvari No 49, Adana 01120 Turkiye
Ibis Adana.description:
If you’re looking for a trendy hotel in Adana, look no further than Ibis Adana.
Nearby landmarks such as Yeni Camii (0.3 mi) and Saint Paul Church (0.4 mi) make Ibis Adana a great place to stay when visiting Adana.
Ibis Adana is a trendy hotel offering a flat screen TV, a minibar, and air conditioning in the rooms, and it is easy to stay connected during your stay as free wifi is offered to guests.
The hotel features a 24 hour front desk, a concierge, and room service. Plus, guests can enjoy a lounge, which has made this a popular choice among travelers visiting Adana. For guests with a vehicle, free parking is available.
During your visit, be sure to check out a popular Adana doner kebab restaurant such as Yuzevler Kebap, which is a short distance from Ibis Adana.
Looking to explore? Then look no further than Tas Kopru (0.6 mi), Adana Merkez Park (0.2 mi), and Art Jophiel (0.6 mi), which are some popular Adana attractions – all conveniently located within walking distance of the hotel.
The staff at Ibis Adana looks forward to serving you during your upcoming visit.
Ibis Adana.address_string: Turhan Cemal Beriker Bulvari No 49, Adana 01120 Turkiye

reviews.title: Very good!
reviews.review_text:
Very good hotel. English spoken. Excellent breakfast and incredible staff. Rooms are good and well equipped. Taxi station outside. Reception at 1st floor. Near to Airport and city center.

There are some restaurants and supermarkets near but restaurant is very good.

reviews.title: Ibis, Adana, Turkey
reviews.review_text: The hotel was clean as was the room. The room itself was small, with a small space in the corner for hanging clothes from our cases. On a few occasions, I found myself standing at reception awaiting attention as the staff were busy elsewhere. It was not fantastic, but we didn’t expect anything special and it served our purpose. The breakfast provided was plentiful and varied. All in all, I suppose it was ‘Good’ but that option was not available. The least said about the location, the better.

reviews.title: A good place in Adana
reviews.review_text: We weren't expecting anything more than a room to sleep in. The staff was excellent as was the food. Mehmet was an exceptional waiter. Rooms were basic we were happy when staff addressed a water leak right away.

reviews.title: Very clean
reviews.review_text: Nice hotel , very cleane. Nice break fast. Staff very helpful they know english all of them. Price and location was perfect. My room veiw wasn’t very nice but my friends they had nice views. Rooms are little small but they designed them nice . If i go mersine I’m going there again

reviews.title: Great stay in Adana
reviews.review_text:
This is a good hotel for a short stay.
The afternoon receptionist wasn't warm and welcoming enough.
The AC was noisy and it was hard to tolerate the noise which after our request, they change our room as soon as possible which was fantastic. The room was not spacious but you have enough to be comfortable

Divan Adana.address: Turhan Cemal Beriker Bulvari, No 33 Cinarli Mahallesi, Adana 01120 Turkiye
Divan Adana.description: Centrally located in the Seyhan district of Adana, our guests are within walking distance of some of the city's most beautiful and unspoiled spots, including many of the city's must-see sights. For those visiting Adana on business, the city's business districts are also easily accessible. Adana Airport is only four kilometres (2.5 miles) from the hotel and can be reached in just 10 minutes.
Divan Adana.address_string: Turhan Cemal Beriker Bulvari, No 33 Cinarli Mahallesi, Adana 01120 Turkiye

reviews.title: Great Value for Money
reviews.review_text:
Excellent infrastructure and service. Large and well decorated room with well designed bathroom. Excellent climate control, adequate lighting, complete mini bar, 
Well spread breakfast and dinner options.Excellent gym and indoor pool,  And above all courteous staff meeting all your needs

reviews.title: Great little hotel
reviews.review_text:
Great little hotel which is absolutely spotless and very friendly staff. The only negative i can say about this place is the outside seating is quite limited and the drinks prices are a bit pricey. Other than that i can't really fault it.

I do think its more of a business/short stay sort of hotel than a holidaying one.

reviews.title: Very nice hotel in Adana
reviews.review_text: Stayed here two nights while visiting the hospital in Adana. Thoroughly excellent hotel with very good quality rooms, and restaurant. Rooms are very big and well equipped, beds are fairly comfortable. Shower is excellent. Our room had aircon and a hairdryer and also a minibar

reviews.title: I wouldn't go back. Very rude reception staff
reviews.review_text:
We arrived late at night to be greeted by extremely rude reception staff, the asked for my name and basically started shouting that we didn't have a reservation they woman continued to talk inturkish and laugh in our faces wolhicj was very unsettling then after 10min of back and forth I wrote my name down for her to have spelt it wrong on her system remarkably she found my reservation then told me they had no single beds available for me and my friend ro have to share a bed for the nights we was staying there. Again in the morning we was met again with the same rude staff we left the hotel for the day as there's literally nothing available we wasn't made aware of the hotels pool/spa
We arrived later that evening and greeted by friendly lobby staff at tge security entrance then headed towards the elevator which is too the right of the reception staff where again the 3 members of extremely rude staff who saw us the night before was there we stepped into the lift and realised the card wasn't working that's why the lift wasn't working but instead of taking a few steps towards us and help us they shouted " CARD NOT WORKING LADY COME HERE NOW" infornt of people in the lobby it was  very intimidating I then walked to her she snatched the card and then just slammed it back on desk. 

Food was average I don't recommend the soup it's very oily 
The electricity kept going out and back on was frustrating. 

It's very very noisy even on the 8th floor

You can hear absolutely everything between rooms and every car pr bike driving past.

For such a expensive hotel I wouldn't recommend and I definitely wouldn't return
They wasn't so welcoming to the English visitors what a shame.

reviews.title: Awesome Hotel , lovely Staff
reviews.review_text:
Meryem was wonderful while serving us
 breakfast
Emre was always there to greet us with a Smile 
Location was close to a lot of places we visited 
Hotel looks awesome and staff are lovely
Amenities look great especially inside pool area
If you stay in Adana and want a really nice hotel , this is the one 
Highly recommend

Adana City Hotel.address: Cevat Yurdakul Cd. No:40 Near Kasimgulek Bridge, Seyhan, Adana 01120 Turkiye
Adana City Hotel.description: Adana City Hotel is an excellent choice for travelers visiting Adana, offering a family-friendly environment alongside many helpful amenities designed to enhance your stay. Close to some of Adana's most popular landmarks, such as Yeni Camii (1.1 mi) and Kemeralti Camii (1.2 mi), Adana City Hotel is a great destination for tourists. Rooms at Adana City Hotel provide air conditioning, and guests can stay connected with free internet access. In addition, while staying at Adana City Hotel guests have access to room service. You can also enjoy free breakfast. Need a place to park? Free parking is available at Adana City Hotel. If you’re looking for a cafe, consider a visit to Starbucks, La Noche Restaurant Cafe & Bar, or Gloria Jean's Coffees, which are all conveniently located a short distance from Adana City Hotel. Enjoy your stay in Adana!
Adana City Hotel.address_string: Cevat Yurdakul Cd. No:40 Near Kasimgulek Bridge, Seyhan, Adana 01120 Turkiye
amenities: Photo Copier / Fax In Business Center

reviews.title: A warm and friendly hotel. Fantastic!
reviews.review_text: The room was excellent, with a nice rainshower in the washroom and great amenities in the room. The kind man working in reception was extremely friendly and welcoming. It is so nice to feel at home in a foreign city. Thank you, Adana City Hotel.

reviews.title: Lovely boutique hotel in Adana
reviews.review_text: Very tidy and clean. Staff is friendly an polite. It includes free breakfast and its really tasty and organic. During the checkout they gifted a traditional local drink which Adana is famous for. Totally advise you to stay here.

Surmeli Adana.description: Relax in clean and comfortable accommodation and enjoy modern amenities, including free wireless internet access. Start the day with a tasty complimentary breakfast before exploring Adana or attending a meeting. Sürmeli Adana Hotel also serves a variety of Turkish and international gourmet cuisine, as well as Adana’s famous kebabs.

reviews.title: Not worth 5 stars
reviews.review_text: we stayed in this hotel for 1 night. the impression this hotel gave was not worthy of 5 stars. absolutely everything was old/worn and dirty and the view was terrible. the photos I took myself show that the photos on the website DO NOT correspond to reality AT ALL. this whole hotel should be thoroughly cleaned….

reviews.title: An avarage hotel
reviews.review_text: I stayed in this hotel for one night. In my opinion smoking is a very big problem especially in hotels in Adana region. Adana Sürmeli unfortunately gets its share from this severe problem as well. Stuff is very helpful and did all their best to make one comfortable. Beds and pillows were very good. WiFi was quite problematic. I must admit I couldn’t get any connection from my room. That was annoying. Rooms were very clean. Breakfast was also not as expected from a 5 star hotel. The place where they serve breakfast was very dark and very flat. Check-out was lightning fast. Overall Surmeli Hotels used to be better in means of quality but they should re-consider themselves.

reviews.title: holiday in adana
reviews.review_text: very good centrally located hotel,close to restaurants, shops and tourist attractions. Taxi journey to the airport is less than 10 minutes . Hotel has a swimming pool and sun terrace which is ideal for relaxation. very comfortable air conditioned room. receptionists were very friendly and helpful and they speak English! Excellent service..the waiters Feyzan and Adem were exceptionally friendly and went out of their way to help. Excellent choice at breakfast. I also ate in the restaurant in the evenings. Food was also very good. Good places to visit are the Merkez mosque, Merkez park, ethnographic museum, the old part of the city around the Buyuk Saat, the tas koprusu ( stone bridge across the river0

reviews.title: Good hotel & location
reviews.review_text: The best feature of this hotel is the convinient location in the Seyhan - adana area near many comercial & retail centers , the bed was very comfortable, the twin bed room was clean and spacious, the breakfast buffet was great and diverse, the service was good, the only downside was that the staff barely speak English , Arabic or any forgein language...

reviews.title: over kitschy with nice location
reviews.review_text: I have been for one night in Surmeli hotel-its very central location and taxi cost 12 turkish lira from airport.For me hotel is a over kitchy,room is good but bed is very short and narrow.Good impression make fruit for wellcome in room.Bathroom is very good.Breakfast is like back in 70" very old furmiture and nothing for choice to eat.Elevators are very tight and very skow and a little bit crotchety.Good for price but not for long stay for me.

Doubletree By Hilton Adana.address: Kurtulus Mahallesi Mithat Saracoglu Caddesi, No 3, Adana 01130 Turkiye
Doubletree By Hilton Adana.description: Located in the Adana’s most popular and central district, DoubleTree by Hilton Adana is the perfect address for a perfect stay experience with friendly service. With an elegant location in the heart of the city, DoubleTree by Hilton Adana offers easy access to the business, entertainment , as well as shopping and cultural attractions.
Doubletree By Hilton Adana.address_string: Kurtulus Mahallesi Mithat Saracoglu Caddesi, No 3, Adana 01130 Turkiye

reviews.title: Doubletree by Hilton is a class!
reviews.review_text: Doubletree By Hilton Adana was another great experience. The staff are friendly and the services are great. I particularly enjoyed the digital key access which was fun, not to forget the impressive breakfast, the clean room and the spacious washroom and the gym. I would strongly recommend this hotel whenever you visit Adana!

reviews.title: Relax in the center of Adana
reviews.review_text: The hotel is very beautiful and new. İnterior decoration is beautiful. Rooms big and very clean, everything is there. Located in the center main shopping street of Adana. Annnnd … the staff is super friendly and helps you immediatly is you have a problem . TOP hotel !!!

reviews.title: Very Satisfied
reviews.review_text: From the time of arrival until the day of departure, I was greeted with good service and smiles. It is nice to be around people with a positive attitude. My corner room was very clean and convenient. The bed was comfortable and great for sleeping. Breakfasts provided a great variety. I will come back again to this hotel.

reviews.title: We have no word..... so fantastic.
reviews.review_text:
Hello doubletree anada.
My first trip was alone for 2 weeks visiting friends n shopping. On the 5th October was with my wife she loved it because in the middle of all. Spacialey shopping n restaurants walking distance. So fantastic hotel well organised staffs re very friendly everything was perfect. My wife was so surprised breakfast morden everything what you need... Thanks to the hotels management  Amazing. Keep it up alway. Will be visiting next year. 
Thanks alot. Thomas from Zurich 🇨🇭. Thanks again.

reviews.title: Great location, excellent service
reviews.review_text: I have stayed only 1 night. I wish I had more time to spend time in this hotel. It is in the heart of the city, walking distance by Merkez park and Ataturk Park. Very modern city with nice, warm, and helpful people. My room was very clean and comfortable. Also I like the quality of products that they use in the room such as kettle, cup for coffee, body cream, and shampoo. Body cream, soap, shampoo are great and have gorgeous smell .

Ramada Hotel & Suites by Wyndham Adana.address: Cinarli Mahallesi, Inonu Caddesi, No:40, Adana 01060 Turkiye
Ramada Hotel & Suites by Wyndham Adana.description:
Finding an ideal trendy hotel in Adana does not have to be difficult. Welcome to Ramada Adana, a nice option for travelers like you.
Guest rooms offer amenities such as a flat screen TV, air conditioning, and a minibar, and guests can go online with free wifi offered by the hotel.
Ramada Adana features room service, to help make your stay more enjoyable. The property also boasts a fitness center and free breakfast. If you are driving to Ramada Adana, free parking is available.
Given the close proximity of popular landmarks, such as Yeni Camii (0.2 mi) and Saint Paul Church (0.3 mi), guests of Ramada Adana can easily experience some of Adana's most well known attractions.
Travelers looking to enjoy some souvlaki can head to Cikcik Ali, Kebapci Mesut, or Birbicer Kebap Salonu. Otherwise, you may want to check out a Mediterranean restaurant such as Pasalimani Bistro & Lounge, Hatay Tadim Sofrasi, or Lokal Cafe Bistro.
Adana is also home to Ali Nihat Gokyigit Botanik Bahcesi, a popular garden that is not too far from Ramada Adana.
Ramada Adana puts the best of Adana at your fingertips, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.
Ramada Hotel & Suites by Wyndham Adana.address_string: Cinarli Mahallesi, Inonu Caddesi, No:40, Adana 01060 Turkiye

reviews.title: best hotell ever
reviews.review_text:
the best hotell the best location
and best staff mr. navres the best front desk manger quite and clean hotell
prime location in city center
mr. nevers is very helpful person for every thing even in pandic corona best service ever

reviews.title: Such a lovely Hotel
reviews.review_text:
Well located in the central
Such a lively and friendly staff especially King Ercan who helped us from his bottom of his heart,recommended hotel of course with no doubt.
Very clean and clear with a good breakfast

reviews.title: A proper Hotel
reviews.review_text: I believe my topic explains it all. Ramada stamp is visible in every corner . All well maintained and all in good condition and all is done for your comfort.  Nice bed , nice location , nice bathroom and efficient  staff. A good city hotel to keep you satisfied.

reviews.title: 4 nights in Adana
reviews.review_text:
Was invited to ADANA to participate in Adana Lezzet Festival as a Chef From Lebanon,
selection of the hotel was done by the tour operator. 
Hotel is Clean service is excellent, Location is Amazings, staff very friendly and not to forget Mr Sulcuk the Owner ho went the extra mile to make our visit extraordinary.

Thank you Ramada Family for the excellent stay.

reviews.title: Service quality
reviews.review_text: Our door swung open at 1 o'clock by a girl as they booked our room to somebody else bcs they couldn't do our check in properly and rebooked our room! No butter in breakfast, we could get a bit when we insisted:( unbelievable service quality for 5*

Jura Hotels Mavi Surmeli Adana.description:
See why so many travelers make Hotel Mavi Surmeli their hotel of choice when visiting Adana. Providing an ideal mix of value, comfort and convenience, it offers a family-friendly setting with an array of amenities designed for travelers like you.
Hotel Mavi Surmeli offers guests an array of room amenities including a minibar and air conditioning, and getting online is possible, as free wifi is available.
The hotel offers room service and a concierge, to make your visit even more pleasant. The property also features an on-site restaurant.
For those interested in checking out popular landmarks while visiting Adana, Hotel Mavi Surmeli is located a short distance from Yeni Camii (0.1 mi) and Saint Paul Church (0.3 mi).
While visiting Adana, you may want to try some doner kebab at one of the nearby restaurants, such as Yuzevler Kebap.
Should time allow, Tas Kopru, Adana Merkez Park, and Art Jophiel are some popular attractions that are within walking distance.
We’re sure you’ll enjoy your stay at Hotel Mavi Surmeli as you experience all of the things Adana has to offer.

reviews.title: Nice Hotel in a central location
reviews.review_text: After a long time we wanted to make a Mediterranean region food and sightseeing tour for 10 days,Adana is well know with its food beside that Adana has a different meaning for me too.I studied in Cukurova University for 4 years and I love everything about Adana.My best days were here till I got married.I have lots of fond of memories all around and I wanted to show this city to my girls.This hotel is just located in Carsi(central) you may go to lots of places by walking and they were nice enough to park my car and help us with luggages.We were also upgraded to the penthouse which has two connected rooms so that you may need some privacy as well.The room is well equipped,especially the Ac was working properly which is a Must thing in Adana’s climate.We for sure will be back.

reviews.title: Reasonably priced city hotel next to mall
reviews.review_text:
The rooms are of an adequate size . Beds are comfy , wifi adequate , toilet with shower , water pressure good . Fridge comes with two plastic cups of mineral water complimentary . Best thing is it is next to a big mall . 
Dinner was a set arranged by the tour company . We had beef with rice-lacked seasoning in my opinion . Fruits were plentiful for desert.

reviews.title: Bussiness Hotel in Adana
reviews.review_text: Clean and comfortable hotel rooms. breakfast was ok. Hotel staff was very kind and helpfull.They offered very nice kebap house. Only the area of the hotel is not nice. Street and shops are uncared……..

reviews.title: Great beach hotel
reviews.review_text: We stopped at the Mavi for one night as we drove from Monteverdi down to Osa.  What a perfect beach hotel.    Short walk to the beach and downtown, and our room was large, clean, and well lit. The property has a nice swimming pool, which was perfect for a late evening dip.  Breakfast was excellent - lots of fresh fruit, pancakes, home-baked bread and home-made jams.

reviews.title: Top Quality and Very Friendly Staff
reviews.review_text: I stayed here a few days recently, and the Mavi Surmeli was an excellent choice. It is very centrally located. My room was large and comfortable. WiFi, heating, hot water, breakfast were all good. The staff was very friendly, and several of them speak good English. I paid 110 TL for a single, which was reasonable considering the good quality of the hotel. I would certainly stay here again next time I am in Adana.

Anemon Adana Hotel.address: Yeni Mahalle 87072 Sokak No:50, Adana 01200 Turkiye
Anemon Adana Hotel.description:
Finding an ideal hotel in Adana does not have to be difficult. Welcome to Anemon Adana Hotel, a nice option for travelers like you.
Close to Adana Merkez Camii (2.3 mi), a popular Adana landmark, Anemon Adana Hotel is a great destination for tourists.
Anemon Adana Hotel is a hotel offering air conditioning in the rooms, and it is easy to stay connected during your stay as free wifi is offered to guests.
The hotel features a 24 hour front desk, a concierge, and room service. Plus, guests can enjoy a pool and an on-site restaurant, which have made this a popular choice among travelers visiting Adana. For guests with a vehicle, free parking is available.
If you're looking for a place to eat, Gundogdu Iskender (0.2 mi) and Sbarro (0.5 mi) are all within walking distance of Anemon Adana Hotel.
Best of all, Anemon Adana Hotel makes it easy to experience some great Adana attractions like Art Jophiel, which is a popular art gallery.
Anemon Adana Hotel looks forward to welcoming you on your visit to Adana.
Anemon Adana Hotel.address_string: Yeni Mahalle 87072 Sokak No:50, Adana 01200 Turkiye

reviews.title: A disappointing experience all round. No wonder the restaurant was empty.
reviews.review_text:
On recommendation my husband and I booked a table at the hotel’s restaurant for our wedding anniversary. Despite it looking like a nice restaurant, the food on offer was just the same as that on offer in any ocakbaşı in Adana. The room was disapointingly empty but for us and another couple (and a big black fly that wouldn’t leave our table). A bottle of sweet dessert white wine was produced and shown to my husband (who doesn’t really drink wine) and served served in huge glasses. While we were still obviously eating our mezes, they were cleared away for our main course …mine chicken breast. With the first bite I started to burn up as it was overly spicy. The waiter removed it and a loud argument started in the kitchen with the chef saying that the guest should ask for the meal to not be spicy.  After 20 minutes, the replacement chicken came back but unbelievably salty. We paid 735tl and left. 
  PS..We sat by the window to the terrace where, apparently, the staff go to have a cigarette. 
 PPS…this place obviously thinks that the actual room, decor and having a waiter pull out the lady’s chair is all that is required to charge a fortune for the experience. 
PPPS…during our time there, I used the restroom….it was difficult to find as it was in a dark hallway.  I had to enter a room to turn on the light after guessing it could be the ladies’ which it thankfully was.

reviews.title: Trash hotel - 5 star rating is a joke!
reviews.review_text: Normally Anemon in Turkey is really good…Adana location deserves a hard pass! Room was filthy, a/c not working and we were told all the other residents wanted the heat on (lies!) room smelled of smoke and it was supposed to be non-smoking. Bathroom was nasty and dim lighting, hot water barely worked. There is no carpet in the room and my feet were black on the bottom so the cleanliness level is very bad. Please save your money and pay a little extra for a hotel like Divan  or Ibis. This place needs to either get their sh*t together or close down.

reviews.title: Nice clean and spacious stay
reviews.review_text:
I had a very nice clean room with good view on the fron side of the hotel. Breakfast was too good but they didnt have real cappuccino and I was disappointed that they offered me the machine artificial powder cappuccino when I asked for it. Given the class of this hotel I assumed they would have it, anyways its just my personal observation. The staff was very polite and they spoke tiny bit of English. The staff defintely needs to have more English skills. I tried to complain to reception about loud noises of music coming from room above me all throughout night but it was impossible to explain to them and also after explaining there was no result.
If I had a quiet room, everything else was so good including the staff and prices. I would stay here again if I visit again.

reviews.title: Mr
reviews.review_text:
The Hotel from last i visited two years ago has detiriated in service terrebly 
The breakfeast room and carpets were very dirty 
Service was poor 
Quality of the buffet was poor in hygien 
Its sad to see how bad management can ruin a nice hotel like this :( 
Hope they can get things sorted

reviews.title: Good enough
reviews.review_text:
As first, it is little bit away from the city center. 
It is new, clean and comfortable hotel. The rooms and the bathrooms in the rooms are pretty big. They have water, tea and coffee in the room as free of charge.
The staff are very helpful and smiley. The best thing was the price for this time. I paid 41 euro including breakfast for this 5 stars hotel.

reviews.title: Wonderful spot to exercise
reviews.review_text: A beautiful sprawling green space down by the river in the shadow of the imposing mosque, Merkez is extremely popular for families in the afternoon and evening, and is a great spot to exercise in the morning. The loop around the entire park is around two miles, and there are numerous pathways through the middle in all directions. Very pretty place.

reviews.title: Nice brigde and water pond in this park
reviews.review_text: When you have children with you this is another stop off to allow you to recharge. There are also small cafes within the park for grown ups to chill out while the youngters run about enjoying the walk paths and forest within it.

reviews.title: great park , quiet and relaxing experience
reviews.review_text: we was all impressed , by the cleanliness and   beauty of this  park close to the riverbank and  city center .

reviews.title: Serene
reviews.review_text:
It is one of many parks among other parks in Adana with the difference that the mosque is centered adjacent to the road and the park. 
It allows you to recollect your thoughts under the shade of a veranda, which pretty much reminds you of an Asian setting. 
I would recommend for anyone to just really sit down and enjoy the locals basking under the veranda with them. It’s a good place to start your trip from here and plan the next trip. 
I would also recommend visitors to cross over from the famous Sinanpaşa bridge to the other side of the canal and drink a Turkish tea under the shade in a local cafe.

reviews.title: love great for kids
reviews.review_text: ride the train, feed the ducks great history, great views, take pictures, instagram worthy, love love

Adana Archeology Museum.address: Resatbey Mah. Fuzuli Cad. No:10 Gazipasa, Seyhan, Adana Turkiye
Adana Archeology Museum.address_string: Resatbey Mah. Fuzuli Cad. No:10 Gazipasa, Seyhan, Adana Turkiye

reviews.title: A Must Visit Place - Excellent
reviews.review_text: The new Adana Museum is amazing . It has something for everyone in several  historic buildings. There is a very detailed archeological section plus other sections with information about the industrial development of Adana . The exhibits are well labeled and the museum is very spacious . We were on a guided tour and the guides were excellent . I was pleasantly surprised and very happy that we went to visit this museum. Highly recommend it.

reviews.title: Adana Museum Civilization
reviews.review_text: I surprised the museum Very amazing tour and experience of history and explaining all civilizations Turkey and Adana but Air conditioning very bad weak AC

reviews.title: A trip to ancient times of Cukurova region
reviews.review_text: This is also an etnographical museum.You can see the  Historical heritage of Cukurova too. The stone cut artefacts , the marble sculpturesare marveĺous.

reviews.title: Great Museum
reviews.review_text: The new Adana Archaeology Museum is definitely a must see when you are in Adana. The exhibits is well presented and covers a vast period of human history. The descriptions are in Turkish and English and the lay out is easy to follow. They also have various seating places if you get tired from walking. The mosaic part if absolutely wonderful and you walk on a glass surface with the mosaics laid out as close to there original state as possible. Most of the mosaics are from the Misis site. The restaurant is lovely as you can also sit outside to have coffee and the museum shop is good.

reviews.title: Neolithic to Ottoman
reviews.review_text: Very well done exhibits with info in Turkish and English covering the Neolithic,Hellenistic, Hittite, Roman and Byzantine periods. Mosaics from Roman era buildings a welcome find.Note Misis(Mopsuestia) mosaic been moved here as well.

M1 Adana AVM.address: Yeni Mah. Ogretmenler Bul. 87071 Sk. No: 5 Seyhan, Adana 01200 Turkiye
M1 Adana AVM.address_string: Yeni Mah. Ogretmenler Bul. 87071 Sk. No: 5 Seyhan, Adana 01200 Turkiye

reviews.title: ILIR GASHI
reviews.review_text: Great people, great country, great food.  We stay one night on Hilton Hotel. For the dinner we visit a restaurant and when you visit Adana must try Adana kebap.

reviews.title: More than a day
reviews.review_text: This mall is huge. You need more than a day to scan all stores if you are here for shopping. The food court is huge but get very busy around 1 in the weekends. Some stores were small in size and choice of items in comparison with other malls. We went by taxi for 20 minutes ride. Taxis are found in front of the mall. You could also take a trolley and fill it with all your shopping bags. There is an Ikea store outside but did not have time to visit it.

reviews.title: A little far out but has everything
reviews.review_text: The largest mall in Adana, with a huge cineplex and food court. Also department stores that have their own block in addition to the mall itself. A huge Carrefour is located here as well. Worth a trip to escape the heat and humidity in summer, or just for shopping and watching a movie.

reviews.title: Shopping Mall
reviews.review_text: Nice place for shopping and big free parking area. A bit far from the city center, but close to the airport.

reviews.title: A mall to visit
reviews.review_text: I really liked it it is a huge mall with most of the brands all on one floor with a good food court, i recommend visiting it if you go to adana

reviews.title: Interesting architecture
reviews.review_text: The architecture is amazing. The museum be it full of stories means nothing much to me as no English explanation on any of the exhibits.

reviews.title: For Turkish cinema lover
reviews.review_text: Although this museum doesn't have very rich content, it takes you through a nostalgic trip through Turkish cinema history by posters, photos and wax models. A must-see for Turkish cinema lovers.

reviews.title: Pity it was closed
reviews.review_text:
I had heard about this Turkish Cinema Museum from friends who liked it a lot and it was definitely on our list of places to see in Adana but it was closed every time we tried to go there. It was either Sunday, new year’s day or there was a problem with the security system, so we couldn’t go in. We just saw some film posters when the security staff opened the door to tell us it was closed. However, I know that it was a place worth visiting. It is by the Seyhan River next to Atatürk’s house and across the Tas Kopru. 
Their telephones which were listed didn’t answer either.

Adana Muze Kompleksi.address: Doseme Mahallesi Ahmet Cevdet Yag Caddesi, Acibadem Hastanesi Yani, Seyhan, Adana Turkiye
Adana Muze Kompleksi.address_string: Doseme Mahallesi Ahmet Cevdet Yag Caddesi, Acibadem Hastanesi Yani, Seyhan, Adana Turkiye

reviews.title: Adana Müzesi
reviews.review_text:
Very nice museum with a lot of useful and interesting information. Adana, as one of the most interesting cities in Turkey, deserves such nice place.

Adana şehrine yakışır son derece iyi tasarlanmış bir müze. Dolu dolu tarihi bilgi alabilirsiniz.

reviews.title: Just Superb
reviews.review_text: The new museum can still be something of a mystery to taxi drivers.  The safest thing is to ask for the Acibadem Hastanesi which is next door.  The exhibits are brilliantly displayed in a converted factory - the arrangements for viewing the brilliant mosaic pavements are especially brilliant.  Note that the Misis Mosaic is now here rather than at the Misis Museum. English info as ell as Turkish throughout - even in the videos.  Well done, Adana. A triumph

reviews.title: Impressive new museum
reviews.review_text:
This excellent museum is very new so its ranking is not yet where it should be.  It will soon be the Nr 1 place to see in Adana. 
An old and giant textile factory was converted into a modern museum, which is very well planned and with adequate information in Turkish and English. 

There is a short video about Adana at the beginning, both in Turkish and in English. We learn from this video that there were always settlements in Adana, even before the Neolithic period. It was home to the Hittite and Kizzuwatna civilizations, Eastern Roman Empire, Selchuks, Ramazanogullari and the Ottoman Empire before the Republic of Turkey. The earliest signs of settlement date back to 10.000 BC. 

The museum is not fully complete yet but there is a lot to see, from Neolithic objects to kitchen and dining utensils, rhytons, figurines, glass objects, jewelry, statues and busts, sarcophagi. 

One of the most striking displays in the museum is the excellent mosaic section, which is huge and where you see the mosaics from a glass platform above. It is a little scary but there is no need to be afraid as modern technology was used here. 

There is a small gift shop and a cafe downstairs.

reviews.title: Audacious Adana Archaeological Museum
reviews.review_text: The museum is the newly opened Archaeological Museum across the street from the Acibadem Adana Hastanesi in a restored early 1900 textile mill located at Resatbey Mahallesi, 60064 Sokak No. 10, Seyhan.  This complex replaces the closed Muze Building near the Sabanci Merkez Camii (Mosque). The entrance fee is 5 Turkish Lira (TL) per adult (this is about $1.25 USD at the April 2018 exchange rate). The museum opened its doors in May 2017. The galleries are converted long sheds with a new wing of mosaics to open in June 2018. Upon the entry to the galleries there is a short introductory film and a timeline beginning with Gobekli Tepe (10,000 years BC) to the Republican era 1923 till today. Major epochs include the Lycians, Grecian, Roman, Byzantium, Sejuk, and Ottoman. The museum features a cafe, and gift shop and large central courtyard.

Hayal Kahvesi Adana.address_string: GuzelyalI Mah. Turgut Ozal BulvarI 16/B Servet Apt. AltI Cukurova, 01170 Adana, Adana 01170 Turkiye

reviews.title: I do not recommend
reviews.review_text:
I do not recommend. Xenophobia Space, with 10 security guards at the entrance where no one speaks English, I don't know how Turkey intends to enter the EU.
Very poor service for a space that aims to be Elitist

reviews.title: Top of the few alternatives in Adana
reviews.review_text: Two floors, bottom floor live music between 22.30-2.30  on weekends. Top floor live music on wednesdays, fridays, saturdays... a huge restaurant patio and nice affluent crowd especially thursday thru saturday. Tuesdays salsa night..

reviews.title: nice club in the heart of Adana
reviews.review_text: It was a lovely saturday night in Adana. Our wonderful friends in Adana invited us to Hayal Kahvesi late night. Although we were tired, we wanted to listen a live music and indeed it was a good decision to follow them. The band was successful in turkish and international music. we were 8 people and loved it much.

Adana Transfer.address: Ismetpasa mahallesi Mehmet Akif Ersoy Caddesi, Adana 01200 Turkiye
Adana Transfer.description: Adana airport private transfer , chaufeur driven services, daily tour, business trip transfers. Otel transfers, rental car services with English speaking driver.
Adana Transfer.address_string: Ismetpasa mahallesi Mehmet Akif Ersoy Caddesi, Adana 01200 Turkiye

reviews.title: Charging 5 times more than local prices.
reviews.review_text: I sent a WhatsApp message asking for a quote, which should be around £30. I am Turkish and check prices beforehand. The guy quoted me 4700 Turkish Lira, around £138.  That is a crazy price. Because my phone number was UK. so don't get robbed by these guys, I have prove on my Whatsapp,See the screenshot. See the screen shot of the quote.

reviews.title: Excellent service. Very reliable.
reviews.review_text: We used a car and driver over four days in Turkey.  This is a top quality, highly professional and reliable service. I would recommend it to anyone. The manager was responsive and spoke very good English. He checked to make sure everything was going well. It was top class.

reviews.title: Professional, prompt and respectful driver. A great experience.
reviews.review_text:
I recently used this car service for a day tour and was extremely impressed with the experience. The driver was not only prompt and on time, but also incredibly respectful and professional throughout the entire trip. 

The vehicle was also very clean and comfortable. I highly recommend this car service for anyone looking for a reliable and enjoyable day tour experience. The driver was a true professional and made the whole experience enjoyable. 5/5 stars

reviews.title: Take Doluis to City Centre instead
reviews.review_text: To get the dolmus to the city centre, leave the airport, cross the road opposite you and wait for the Meydan Dolmus to the centre, which will cost you 3TL. You can pay cash, but future journeys are cheaper if you buy a travel card from a kiosk in Adana

reviews.title: Adana airport transfer travel daily tours
reviews.review_text:
We were in Adana and Mersin cities. 
Adana transfer supplied vtc car rental service with english speaking driver. 
We are so pleased for this travel agency for theirs services

Adana Optimum Alisveris Ve Eglence Merke.address_string: HacI SabancI BulvarI No:28, Yuregir 01220 Turkiye

reviews.title: shopaholic here is your place
reviews.review_text: Once you arrived a security guard asked for our passports and then we entered. This mall is big but doable in a day. Zara is found only here. The other stores like US Polo, Mango, Ipekyol... are bigger compared to other malls. We took a trolley from Migros and filled it with our purchases. A taxi station is found outside the mall. An average food court is found in the last floor with a big terrace. You can also find luggage in different shops if you need one.

reviews.title: optimum shopping
reviews.review_text: variety of shops. The mall is ideal for shopping and leisure time. you can find anything you need in the mall. it is also very close to the city centre. by taxi it will cost about 15-20 TL to the mall.

reviews.title: location is great and you can find all you need
reviews.review_text: visited twice during my 4 days stay at Adana.a walking distance from Hitlon Hotel.experience is nice and you can find everything inside.

reviews.title: Very popular
reviews.review_text:
I visited twice during my 4 days visit to Adana. I found everything I needed , entertainment for kids,  large food court with very options of food , many brands international and Turkish with good prices.  
It's very convenient and you can spend time without being bored .

reviews.title: Great destination for shopping!
reviews.review_text:
Its a big mall with wide variety of products for all tastes. Many nice shops and good prices.
Be careful no money exchange at the mall and the only acceptable currency is turkish lira!
Walking distance from sheraton hotel.

Adana Isi.address: Mustafa Kemal Pasa BulvarI Orhangazi Apt. B Blok Asma Kat No:33/2 Gazipaşa Mah., Adana 01140 Turkiye
Adana Isi.description: Adana’yı Adanalı’yı anlatan şehrin ruhunu, dilini ve kültürünü yansıtan tasarımları hediyelik ürünlere aktardık.
Adana Isi.address_string: Mustafa Kemal Pasa BulvarI Orhangazi Apt. B Blok Asma Kat No:33/2 Gazipaşa Mah., Adana 01140 Turkiye

Adana.description: Traffic-locked boulevards, industrial suburbs, and modern shopping malls are exactly what you’d expect from one of Turkey’s largest cities—and Adana doesn't fall short. Amid the chaotic cityscape, there are scenic riverside parks, mosques, and traditional bazaars, where tiny restaurants serve the local specialty: Adana kebab.

reviews.title: Top 5 Restaurant
reviews.review_text: Mouth watering kebab and a fun location in Adana. Right in the central restaurant area. Definitely walked the line of traditional food but with a slightly (but not too) upscale atmosphere.  Everything we ordered tasted fresh and home made.

reviews.title: Adana HiltonSA highly recommended !
reviews.review_text:
Fantastic hotel with the best staff and customer service in Adana ☺️
Damla and Acelya in the customer care team are exceptional and managed me and Koch team so professionally.
The front desk are always friendly and welcoming and the executive lounge is a complete pleasure managed by the super friendly Selcuk

reviews.title: Clean, quality and peaceful.
reviews.review_text: There was no salad in Lounge. The meat served was very delicious. Lounge employee Selçuk took great care of us. The pool was freezing. The Hotel staff is always polite, friendly and professional. The Hotel is very close to the City Center.....

reviews.title: Our home away from home
reviews.review_text: Our favorite hotel in Adana, we always choose to stay here when we are in the city. Location, staff and breakfast is perfect. Naz (from the breakfast staff) is such a kind and friendly person, it has been a pleasure to know her. Rooms are wide and comfortable. We have tried massage this time, that was also very relaxing. Great service, we’ll keep coming back.

reviews.title: Disappointing Stay with Poor Service and Inconveniences
reviews.review_text:
The problems began as soon as we arrived at the hotel and continued with issues in the elevator. The staff showed no concern for our complaints and merely pretended to be working. We arrived at the hotel at 5 PM, yet our room, which was supposed to be ready by 2 PM, was still not prepared. Accessing the elevators was another hassle since they operate with room cards, and somehow, the staff managed to lose ours.

For future visits, be aware that you’re likely to face issues during both check-in and check-out. The bathrooms have no locks, and even something as simple as a cup of coffee can take up to two hours to reach your table.

Sheraton Grand Adana.address: Haci Sabanci Boulevard No 7, Adana 01220 Turkiye
Sheraton Grand Adana.description: The iconic S-shaped Sheraton Grand Adana proudly follows in the tradition of linking East and West by offering an exciting space for trendsetting locals and cosmopolitan visitors. Vibrant, colorful restaurants and bars of Sheraton Grand Adana Hotel serve an intriguing blend of international cuisine and classic Turkish favorites, including the Adana Kebab. The hotel is a leisurely walk from the splendid Adana City Center and only 4.5 Kilometers away from Adana Sakirpasa Airport. Enjoy excellent views of the broad Seyhan River, spanned by Taskopru bridge, the world's oldest bridge still in use, the remarkable Sabanci Central Mosque and spacious Central Park, all just minutes away. The charming beaches of Yumurtalik and Karatas, far less crowded than more popular nearby resorts, are a short drive away. Enjoy upscale comforts in any of our 240 guest rooms just looking into excellent views of the broad Seyhan River and the city. Stay connected with High Speed Internet Access, and get a good night's sleep with a Sheraton Signature Sleep Experience. Recharge at the Sheraton Fitness and also Fitness Club & SPA center, take a dip in our indoor or outdoor pool, or indulge yourself with a pampering spa.
Sheraton Grand Adana.address_string: Haci Sabanci Boulevard No 7, Adana 01220 Turkiye

reviews.title: Worst Service
reviews.review_text:
The hotel infrastructure is really nice. But the service staff except some are very poor.
Specially breakfast service is very poor.

I stayed at this hotel more than a year but breakfast manager never tried to fix the issues.

Hotel staff do not care about regular business guest.

Fitness center is nice and staff is always friendly.

reviews.title: Very bad experience
reviews.review_text:
I have a room today in Sheraton adana hotel on second floor and the AC not working at all , the weather very hot , i called guest services (1700) many times to send someone to fix the AC she not understanding English and eveytime she ask me to repeat what i need. ANd told me the technician coming now 1 hour without any response.
Really very very bad experience in this hotel.

reviews.title: A beautiful hotel
reviews.review_text: The hotel is very grand, per the name, and there are beautiful, comfortable rooms and a wonderful view. There are some.staff that are excellent at their job,  Neslihan, Aysa, and the lounge crew is excellent. Osman, Ahmad, and most of the breakfast crew are professional, efficient, and courteous. The tennis court is perfect in the winter. I would expect higher quality and more diverse food from a 5 star hotel, but I also ate there a lot.

reviews.title: Great Experience at the Sheraton Grand Adana
reviews.review_text:
I decided to book the Grand Sheraton Adana after spending a week at hotel 10 min down the road (I***)that was overall terrible.  
Upon entering the lobby of the Grand Sheraton, I was greeted with friendly faces.  I was fortunate to have Mr. Gani attend to me while checking in.  He was polite and very attentive to my needs. The check in process was very pick and easy.  After speaking with Mr. Gani, I immediately knew that I had  selected the right hotel.  I will definitely recommend those visiting Adana to stay at the Sheraton Grand and experience  the pleasant atmosphere of the staff and facilities.

reviews.title: Close to city center
reviews.review_text: We visited Adana for the film festival and Sheraton Grand's location was handy. We could reach the city either by taxi or on foot. Our room was spacious with  beautiful view. Open pool was like heaven in that Adana heat. Staff was helpfull and polite. We loved our stay.

Adana Hilton SA.address: Sinanpasa Mah Haci Sabanci Bul No:1, Adana 01220 Turkiye
Adana Hilton SA.description: From Adana Sakirpasa Airport, the airport exit road leads to the traffic lights at the crossroads on Mersin-Adana Street. Turn right and continue straight until the River Seyhan. You will see the Adana Hilton SA hotel on the opposite side of the river and the hotel entrance is on the right-hand side just after the bridge. The journey takes about 5 minutes.

reviews.review_text:
The problems began as soon as we arrived at the hotel and continued with issues in the elevator. The staff showed no concern for our complaints and merely pretended to be working. We arrived at the hotel at 5 PM, yet our room, which was supposed to be ready by 2 PM, was still not prepared. Accessing the elevators was another hassle since they operate with room cards, and somehow, the staff managed to lose ours.

For future visits, be aware that you’re likely to face issues during both check-in and check-out. The bathrooms have no locks, and even something as simple as a cup of coffee can take up to two hours to reach your table.

Adana Ocakbasi.address: Ergenekon Caddesi, Baysungur Sokak No: 2, Istanbul Turkiye
Adana Ocakbasi.address_string: Ergenekon Caddesi, Baysungur Sokak No: 2, Istanbul Turkiye

reviews.title: Local, no frill place. freshly grilled kebap with a bit of spice
reviews.review_text: Good, quick, casual place. It was recommended by my friend who is an expat in Istanbul. No frill service, no special atmosphere, as one expects. Meat and veggies and flat bread are grilled as you order your dishes.

reviews.title: Mediocre and no hospitality
reviews.review_text: Im not sure where the other reviewers are eating but this was by far the most mediocre meal we’ve had out of 6meals. Other than the lamb meat being tender the side dishes were very bland. Meat portion very small. Absolutely no welcome, no warmth whatsoever from any staff and no thank you when we paid. Also first restaurant not to serve a complimentary  fruit plate.

reviews.title: Restaurante
reviews.review_text: The best restaurant in Turkey. If you are in Turkey you have to visit Adana Ocakabasi!!!!! And our server Adem was so nice too us and we got the best drinks and food. 5/5 stars!!!

reviews.title: Authentic & tasty kebabs!
reviews.review_text:
This is all about the open grill and authentic local food - the decor is basic and staff dont speak English. 
I had chicken kebab and watched the grill guy spit cook it over the glowing embers! V tasty and will try a lamb dish next time. 
Nearest metro is Osmambey or a 15 min walk from Taksim.

reviews.title: A great hidden place
reviews.review_text: Great local place. A Turkish friend took me there. Small street and a small place. Simple but perfect. We had few small salads and few meat dishes all cooked and seasoned perfectly

Ibis Adana.address: Turhan Cemal Beriker Bulvari No 49, Adana 01120 Turkiye
Ibis Adana.description:
If you’re looking for a trendy hotel in Adana, look no further than Ibis Adana.
Nearby landmarks such as Yeni Camii (0.3 mi) and Saint Paul Church (0.4 mi) make Ibis Adana a great place to stay when visiting Adana.
Ibis Adana is a trendy hotel offering a flat screen TV, a minibar, and air conditioning in the rooms, and it is easy to stay connected during your stay as free wifi is offered to guests.
The hotel features a 24 hour front desk, a concierge, and room service. Plus, guests can enjoy a lounge, which has made this a popular choice among travelers visiting Adana. For guests with a vehicle, free parking is available.
During your visit, be sure to check out a popular Adana doner kebab restaurant such as Yuzevler Kebap, which is a short distance from Ibis Adana.
Looking to explore? Then look no further than Tas Kopru (0.6 mi), Adana Merkez Park (0.2 mi), and Art Jophiel (0.6 mi), which are some popular Adana attractions – all conveniently located within walking distance of the hotel.
The staff at Ibis Adana looks forward to serving you during your upcoming visit.
Ibis Adana.address_string: Turhan Cemal Beriker Bulvari No 49, Adana 01120 Turkiye

reviews.title: Very good!
reviews.review_text:
Very good hotel. English spoken. Excellent breakfast and incredible staff. Rooms are good and well equipped. Taxi station outside. Reception at 1st floor. Near to Airport and city center.

There are some restaurants and supermarkets near but restaurant is very good.

reviews.title: Ibis, Adana, Turkey
reviews.review_text: The hotel was clean as was the room. The room itself was small, with a small space in the corner for hanging clothes from our cases. On a few occasions, I found myself standing at reception awaiting attention as the staff were busy elsewhere. It was not fantastic, but we didn’t expect anything special and it served our purpose. The breakfast provided was plentiful and varied. All in all, I suppose it was ‘Good’ but that option was not available. The least said about the location, the better.

reviews.title: A good place in Adana
reviews.review_text: We weren't expecting anything more than a room to sleep in. The staff was excellent as was the food. Mehmet was an exceptional waiter. Rooms were basic we were happy when staff addressed a water leak right away.

reviews.title: Very clean
reviews.review_text: Nice hotel , very cleane. Nice break fast. Staff very helpful they know english all of them. Price and location was perfect. My room veiw wasn’t very nice but my friends they had nice views. Rooms are little small but they designed them nice . If i go mersine I’m going there again

reviews.title: Great stay in Adana
reviews.review_text:
This is a good hotel for a short stay.
The afternoon receptionist wasn't warm and welcoming enough.
The AC was noisy and it was hard to tolerate the noise which after our request, they change our room as soon as possible which was fantastic. The room was not spacious but you have enough to be comfortable

reviews.title: Wonderful spot to exercise
reviews.review_text: A beautiful sprawling green space down by the river in the shadow of the imposing mosque, Merkez is extremely popular for families in the afternoon and evening, and is a great spot to exercise in the morning. The loop around the entire park is around two miles, and there are numerous pathways through the middle in all directions. Very pretty place.

reviews.title: Nice brigde and water pond in this park
reviews.review_text: When you have children with you this is another stop off to allow you to recharge. There are also small cafes within the park for grown ups to chill out while the youngters run about enjoying the walk paths and forest within it.

reviews.title: great park , quiet and relaxing experience
reviews.review_text: we was all impressed , by the cleanliness and   beauty of this  park close to the riverbank and  city center .

reviews.title: Serene
reviews.review_text:
It is one of many parks among other parks in Adana with the difference that the mosque is centered adjacent to the road and the park. 
It allows you to recollect your thoughts under the shade of a veranda, which pretty much reminds you of an Asian setting. 
I would recommend for anyone to just really sit down and enjoy the locals basking under the veranda with them. It’s a good place to start your trip from here and plan the next trip. 
I would also recommend visitors to cross over from the famous Sinanpaşa bridge to the other side of the canal and drink a Turkish tea under the shade in a local cafe.

reviews.title: love great for kids
reviews.review_text: ride the train, feed the ducks great history, great views, take pictures, instagram worthy, love love

Divan Adana.address: Turhan Cemal Beriker Bulvari, No 33 Cinarli Mahallesi, Adana 01120 Turkiye
Divan Adana.description: Centrally located in the Seyhan district of Adana, our guests are within walking distance of some of the city's most beautiful and unspoiled spots, including many of the city's must-see sights. For those visiting Adana on business, the city's business districts are also easily accessible. Adana Airport is only four kilometres (2.5 miles) from the hotel and can be reached in just 10 minutes.
Divan Adana.address_string: Turhan Cemal Beriker Bulvari, No 33 Cinarli Mahallesi, Adana 01120 Turkiye

reviews.title: Great Value for Money
reviews.review_text:
Excellent infrastructure and service. Large and well decorated room with well designed bathroom. Excellent climate control, adequate lighting, complete mini bar, 
Well spread breakfast and dinner options.Excellent gym and indoor pool,  And above all courteous staff meeting all your needs

reviews.title: Great little hotel
reviews.review_text:
Great little hotel which is absolutely spotless and very friendly staff. The only negative i can say about this place is the outside seating is quite limited and the drinks prices are a bit pricey. Other than that i can't really fault it.

I do think its more of a business/short stay sort of hotel than a holidaying one.

reviews.title: Very nice hotel in Adana
reviews.review_text: Stayed here two nights while visiting the hospital in Adana. Thoroughly excellent hotel with very good quality rooms, and restaurant. Rooms are very big and well equipped, beds are fairly comfortable. Shower is excellent. Our room had aircon and a hairdryer and also a minibar

reviews.title: I wouldn't go back. Very rude reception staff
reviews.review_text:
We arrived late at night to be greeted by extremely rude reception staff, the asked for my name and basically started shouting that we didn't have a reservation they woman continued to talk inturkish and laugh in our faces wolhicj was very unsettling then after 10min of back and forth I wrote my name down for her to have spelt it wrong on her system remarkably she found my reservation then told me they had no single beds available for me and my friend ro have to share a bed for the nights we was staying there. Again in the morning we was met again with the same rude staff we left the hotel for the day as there's literally nothing available we wasn't made aware of the hotels pool/spa
We arrived later that evening and greeted by friendly lobby staff at tge security entrance then headed towards the elevator which is too the right of the reception staff where again the 3 members of extremely rude staff who saw us the night before was there we stepped into the lift and realised the card wasn't working that's why the lift wasn't working but instead of taking a few steps towards us and help us they shouted " CARD NOT WORKING LADY COME HERE NOW" infornt of people in the lobby it was  very intimidating I then walked to her she snatched the card and then just slammed it back on desk. 

Food was average I don't recommend the soup it's very oily 
The electricity kept going out and back on was frustrating. 

It's very very noisy even on the 8th floor

You can hear absolutely everything between rooms and every car pr bike driving past.

For such a expensive hotel I wouldn't recommend and I definitely wouldn't return
They wasn't so welcoming to the English visitors what a shame.

reviews.title: Awesome Hotel , lovely Staff
reviews.review_text:
Meryem was wonderful while serving us
 breakfast
Emre was always there to greet us with a Smile 
Location was close to a lot of places we visited 
Hotel looks awesome and staff are lovely
Amenities look great especially inside pool area
If you stay in Adana and want a really nice hotel , this is the one 
Highly recommend

Adana Archeology Museum.address: Resatbey Mah. Fuzuli Cad. No:10 Gazipasa, Seyhan, Adana Turkiye
Adana Archeology Museum.address_string: Resatbey Mah. Fuzuli Cad. No:10 Gazipasa, Seyhan, Adana Turkiye

reviews.title: A Must Visit Place - Excellent
reviews.review_text: The new Adana Museum is amazing . It has something for everyone in several  historic buildings. There is a very detailed archeological section plus other sections with information about the industrial development of Adana . The exhibits are well labeled and the museum is very spacious . We were on a guided tour and the guides were excellent . I was pleasantly surprised and very happy that we went to visit this museum. Highly recommend it.

reviews.title: Adana Museum Civilization
reviews.review_text: I surprised the museum Very amazing tour and experience of history and explaining all civilizations Turkey and Adana but Air conditioning very bad weak AC

reviews.title: A trip to ancient times of Cukurova region
reviews.review_text: This is also an etnographical museum.You can see the  Historical heritage of Cukurova too. The stone cut artefacts , the marble sculpturesare marveĺous.

reviews.title: Great Museum
reviews.review_text: The new Adana Archaeology Museum is definitely a must see when you are in Adana. The exhibits is well presented and covers a vast period of human history. The descriptions are in Turkish and English and the lay out is easy to follow. They also have various seating places if you get tired from walking. The mosaic part if absolutely wonderful and you walk on a glass surface with the mosaics laid out as close to there original state as possible. Most of the mosaics are from the Misis site. The restaurant is lovely as you can also sit outside to have coffee and the museum shop is good.

reviews.title: Neolithic to Ottoman
reviews.review_text: Very well done exhibits with info in Turkish and English covering the Neolithic,Hellenistic, Hittite, Roman and Byzantine periods. Mosaics from Roman era buildings a welcome find.Note Misis(Mopsuestia) mosaic been moved here as well.

Adana Grillhaus.description: For more than 30 years, the skewers have been rotated at Adana Grillhaus. According to the Kreuzberg motto, we are concerned about the inner values. That's why our dishes are first and foremost unique because of their unique taste.

reviews.title: Absolutely superb
reviews.review_text:
Clearly a hugely popular place we are glad we booked as very busy. Still that had no impact on the service or food which were both excellent.

Our waiter was incredibly friendly and helpful. Food is to die for and so succulent and tasty. We clearly ordered too much (I suspect two grill plates is easily enough for three people), but always better to leave feeling full rather than hungry.

This came as a recommendation for us as superb Turkish food and they were not wrong. One of the highlights of our trip.

reviews.title: Reservation with Quandoo or should we say NO Reservation with Quandoo
reviews.review_text:
we reserved a table a few days in advance with Quandoo, that really looks official, we have an email confirmation, a number for the reservation but then on the day no table, no reservation, it was not possible to eat there
really did not appreciated it
can not tell if it is the restaurant or quandoo to blame but I know the result... no diner there

reviews.title: Nice Turkish grill house.
reviews.review_text:
Enjoyed the mixed lamb platter, tasty and well cooked.

Hummus and chilli yoghurt dip in particular was very nice.

Pleasant open plan grilling area and friendly service.

reviews.title: Well done
reviews.review_text:
very professional and luxurious. 
Foods are well. But not special. 
I think, there i can‘t feel their heart. 
Cook not with love

reviews.title: Best Grillhaus in Berlin
reviews.review_text:
The best grillhaus in Berlin… 
Very friendly welcome… Lovely couple running the restaurant…
The taste of bbq is fabulous… Visit and feel…
